text: Phil Gramm (born July 8, 1942) is an American economist and politician. He is a former United States Senator from Texas. He was a member of both the United States House of Representatives and the Senate. He unsuccessfully ran for President in 1996. Gramm was born on July 8, 1942 in Fort Benning, Georgia. He graduated from the University of Georgia. He is married to Wendy Lee Gramm. They have two children. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1942 births Category:1996 United States presidential candidates Category:Living people Category:Businesspeople from Texas Category:Businesspeople from Georgia (U.S. state) Category:Politicians from Georgia (U.S. state) Category:United States senators from Texas Category:United States representatives from Texas Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Phil Gramm
